summary: Cheese Cannon - Shoot cheese wheels from your hands!!!
descriptionHtml:
New to the modding scene so ANY and ALL feedback is welcome!

Update: Added a little extra \"kick\" to spell effect.

This version is for testing purposes.

The cheese cannon currently works much like the Frost Bolt spell (damages health & stamina), except it deals poison dmg.

As of now the impact data doesnt work properly so the cheese wheel dissapears on impact, and I still need to get a cheese wheel for the inventory menu display.

Installation:
Extract .rar file directly to your Skyrim\\Data folder.

Adding the Spell:
open the command console with the \"~\" key.
type \"help \"cheesecannon\"\" to find the spell ID.
type \"player.addspell spellID\"  to add the spell to the player.
Enjoy shooting cheese wheels at people!!!
author: Skeeby
